channel.title: CVE Feed for VMware -- vCenter Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VMware -- vCenter Server

item.title: CVE-2017-4926|2024-09-16T17:59:16.493Z -- vmware -- vcenter%20server
item.description: VMware vCenter Server (6.5 prior to 6.5 U1) contains a vulnerability that may allow for stored cross-site scripting (XSS). An attacker with VC user privileges can inject malicious java-scripts which will get executed when other VC users access the page.
